title: Shattered
description: *** This is the second book in the Broken Trilogy and it ends with a cliffhanger. Intended for 18+.***After experiencing unimaginable heartbreak, I just wanted to end it all.But when I least expected it, life gave me hope once more.Sadly, however, even when you get a second chance, it doesn’t always mean things will work out the way you wanted them to. Some lies were just too painful to move on from.What was worse than being Broken, you wonder? Try being shattered…
author: J.L. Drake
